text:
"Hill, Fern membawakanmu air." Terdengar suara manis yang muat semua orang disini berbalik dan melihatnya.
Baifern (yang aku ingat karena pernah melihat fotonya), memegang segelas minuman manis di tangannya, sebelum berjalan ke [redacted_name] dan memberinya air.
"Terima kasih," kata [redacted_name] dan menerima air itu. Entah kenapa, aku tidak menyukai pemandangan di depanku.
"Jadi, apa yang kau lakukan?" Phi Baifern jauh lebih kecil dari yang diperkirakan dan aku sedikit lebih tinggi darinya. Ditambah dengan rok lipit pendeknya, dia terlihat seperti anak kecil. Lucu sekali.
"Mengambil foto Near. Untunglah Fern datang. Ayo berfoto." [redacted_name] menyeret [redacted_name] ke arahku untuk mengambil foto. "Ini [redacted_name] yang datang untuk mengambil foto untukku hari ini. Oh, sudah berapa kali aku memperkenalkanmu hari ini? Harusnya akan lebih baik jika aku memakai speaker saja!"
"Haha, tadi aku melihat setting speakernya hampir selesai. Kau bisa pergi dan meminjamnya," kata [redacted_name]. Suaranya cerah sekali, seperti suara anak-anak. Dia terlihat sangat jernih. Aku merasa seperti sedang berkabut karena merasa rendah.
trans:
"Hill, Fern brought you some water." A sweet voice rang out, causing everyone here to turn and look.
Baifern (whom I remembered because I had seen her photo before) was holding a glass of sweet drink in her hand, then walked over to [redacted_name] and handed him the water.
"Thank you," [redacted_name] said as he accepted the drink. For some reason, I didn’t like the scene before me.
"So, what are you doing?" Phi Baifern was much smaller than I expected, and I was a little taller than her. Plus, with her short pleated skirt, she looked like a little child. So cute.
"Taking a photo of Near. Luckily, Fern came. Let’s take a photo." [redacted_name] pulled [redacted_name] toward me to take the photo. "This is [redacted_name] who came to take photos for me today. Oh, how many times have I introduced you today? I should have just used a speaker instead!"
"Haha, I saw the speaker setup almost finished earlier. You can go and borrow it," said [redacted_name]. Her voice was so bright, like that of a child. She sounded so clear. I felt like I was in a fog because I felt so small.
